Uses of Package
synesketch.emotion

Packages that use synesketch.emotion
synesketch.emotion   
synesketch.emotion.util   
 

Classes in synesketch.emotion used by synesketch.emotion
AffectWord
          Represents one unit from the Synesketch Lexicon: a word associated with emotional meaning, and it's emotional weights and valence.
Emotion
          Represents one emotion, with it's type and weight.
EmotionalState
          Defines emotional content of the text.
Empathyscope
          Defines logic for transfering textual affect information -- emotional manifestations recognised in text -- into visual output.
 

Classes in synesketch.emotion used by synesketch.emotion.util
AffectWord
          Represents one unit from the Synesketch Lexicon: a word associated with emotional meaning, and it's emotional weights and valence.
